objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Mystery/Detective lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about family and relationships using slang register
Students create original mystery themed content about family and relationships in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using slang register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in slang register within mystery theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
